displayProperties.description: "I got word on another cache in the Echo Mesa. Some of Asher's 'assistants' chased a Legionary out of the Cabal Base but lost him in a little cave nearby. Must've left it there, since the rhino came out empty handed. That's when the assistants got him. Good thing, 'cause I'd rather it go to you." â€”Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Io Treasure Map
